title: Help needed!
content:
It has come to my attention that a few users are experiencing repeated crash when trying to use gradient/color bucket tool.
First of all, I'm very sorry that this happens and interupts the experience while using Pixquare.
Secondly, I want to resolve this issue as soon as possible, however, I was not able to find the root cause based on the crash logs. So if you have encountered this crash, please shoot me an email at info@pixqaure.art or join the Discord server and let me know how to re-create this crash.
I really appreciate your help to make Pixquare better.

Thank you
Son Nguyen.
